Date: Thursday, 2/2/1992
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Willie McGee

Subject: Contract offer

They offer more years.

Regards,
Andres Galarraga

Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Tony Tarasco
Dear Sir,
Tony Tarasco isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Columbia Fireflies!
He has an AVG of .247, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Scouting Director
